official_title: Co-developing and Pilot Testing a Risk-tailored, Technology-supported Intervention to Increase Home Radon Testing in New Hampshire and Vermont
inclusion_criteria:
* Be at least 18 years old
* Have a valid mailing address in New Hampshire or Vermont,
* Have not tested their current homes for radon,
* Rent or own their home, and
* Live at their home year-round
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
